Text: This is a warmed over stylized rehash of "Albedo 0.39". Lots of the same chord progressions. I have "Albedo 0.39" on vinyl and listening to this was like listening to that album only with new stuff thrown in. "Albedo 0.39" is available at http://isohunt.com/dl.php?id=12062682 for comparison. By the way, "Albedo 0.39" was a better album and among his first efforts when synthesized music was in its infancy.
